title: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch WSWB and create two projects
2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (such as 'foo.txt')
3. From the main menu, select File -> Export and select 'Zip File' to export
4.
OB:
In the 'Export' dialog window, select both projects created earlier, give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip'), and begin the export to zip file.

Results:
An error message box pops up: 'Problems were encountered during export' and the detail lists the file of the same name in project 2 as the problem (i.e., 'foo.txt').
SR: Make sure to follow the steps provided above and verify that the export to zip file successfully completes without any error messages.
